snippet: News outlets had sought to unseal any court records that might exist for Michael Brown. Also Wednesday, Missouri’s governor lifted the orders establishing a state of emergency and activating the National Guard.
abstract: Lawyer for St Louis County reveals that slain black teenager Michael Brown had no serious felony cases filed against him as a juvenile; details come at county court hearing over petition by the St Louis Post-Dispatch and another news outlet to unseal any juvenile court records that might exist for Brown, who had no adult criminal record.
lead_paragraph: News outlets had sought to unseal any court records that might exist for Michael Brown. Also Wednesday, Missouri’s governor lifted the orders establishing a state of emergency and activating the National Guard.

headline.main: Michael Brown Never Faced Serious Felony Charge, St. Louis Official’s Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Slain Teenager Never Faced Serious Felony Charge, St. Louis Official’s Lawyer Says
